input: Which one of the following is not a Directive Principle of State Policy?

options.A: The State shall endeavour to secure for the citizens a uniform civil code.
options.B: The State shall promote with special care the educational and economic interest of the weaker sections.
options.C: The State shall endeavour to promote adult education to eliminate illiteracy.
options.D: The State shall endeavour to protect every monument, place or object of artistic or historic interest.

explanation: is not a directive principal of state policy.
